mapper.select: SELECT a.day_length dayLength, a.pay_code payCode, a.create_time createTime, a.use_time useTime, a.id, a.user_id userId, a.is_used isUsed FROM t_pay a WHERE a.pay_code = #{payCode}

and a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_pay( pay_code, user_id, create_time, pay_type, day_length ) value ( #{payCode}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{payType}, #{dayLength} )
mapper.update: update t_pay set is_used = 1, use_time = #{useTime}, machine_code = #{machineCode}, machine_name = #{machineName} where pay_code = #{payCode}
mapper.select: SELECT a.day_length dayLength, a.pay_code payCode, a.create_time createTime, a.use_time useTime, a.id, a.user_id userId, b.username userName, a.is_used isUsed, a.pay_type payType, a.machine_name machineName FROM t_pay a left join t_user b on a.user_id = b.id where a.is_used = 0 and a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.create_time desc limit 10
